description.disks: The installation will erase all the current data in which the disk is selected. It is recommended for you to backup all data.

encryptDisk.leftHand: Do you want to encrypt disk

description.appearances: Select an appearance that you prefer, it can be changed later in the system settings.
description.touchid: You can set up Touch ID to unlock instead of typing password. To get started, click "Set up Touch ID...".
description.bootscreen: If enabled, the logo will be displayed instead of boot messages while in the boot process from now on.

connectWifi.titleRightHand: in order to establish the connection.

promptTouchID.requirePassword: A password is required to enable Touch ID.
promptTouchID.waiting: Please wait a moment, a prompt will appear and ask to place your finger on the sensor.

failed.title: Failed to set up Touch ID

success.title: Successfully set up Touch ID
success.description: From now on, Touch ID will be used as the main sign-in option whenever you unlock your computer.

promptTouchID.touchIDIssue: There's an issue with your Touch ID sensor, and we can't fix it for you unfortunately.

success.title: Installation Complete
success.description: Thank you for choosing BreezeOS as your main operating system. You can now restart your computer.

msgbox.discard: Discard all changes and quit installation?
msgbox.disks: Cannot select disk that is under 50GB, please select another one.

continue.title: Continue?
continue.content: The installer is going to apply changes to your disk. You will not be able to undo these changes after this.

users.passwordDisabled: It is recommended to enable password for your account to keep your data safe.

touchid.enabled: Touch ID is enabled in BreezeOS Native.
